column3:
“The Berkeley I have tried comes from the Portland, OR area.  I have found it to be quite potent and a very up high.  I am a long time cannabis user, so it takes something good to impress me.

One problem with these reviews is that we might not actually be talking about the same strain even though it is named the same as something we previously tried.”
“I loved the lil sample I got...tasted great and I do love me a good, quick sativa high!”

“Smells medically
Really Sticky! 
Little Orange hairs 
Color Lean Green
Breaks Up Like A Fluffy Cloud
Looks Beautiful In Bowel
Burns Like A Bitch
Feeling Faded-One Hit

super high spriskies”
“Berkeley is wild. Very intense, buzzing head high, with a kick of power. A very potent strain that will get you tripping real quick. But not a strain for new smokers as the paranoia is not a joke.”
“I got some of this in Stockton, and it competes with chocolope for best sativa in my opinion.”

“I tried the strain several times because I was given a half ounce of it from a grower friend. I found that it was really nice with alcohol and in a social environment – – but then I accidentally smoked it on a Sunday night before going to bed. The anxiety trip that I had was pretty epic. And I just read the note about it being anxious-dangerous after researching the strain...
That being said it's still very nice, but...”
“Literally the best weed I've ever smoked.”
“Great sativa high. Up tempo, very potent. Focused and energetic. Can't describe the flavor well although it's aroma is very loud. Fluffy and crisp.”
“Literally the best weed I've ever smoked.”
“Strain Surprised Me. I Like The Taste Not As Potent As The Other Sativas I've Tried In The Past But Mos Def A Good Strain”
“has great buds. smoked easy but burns hot. very truely strong”
“Thought provoking, energetic, pleasant and a little warm in a hot cocoa on a cold day kind of way.  Flowery aroma with undertones of ammonia.  Smooth toke; voluminous.  Breath taking.”
“Top notch frosty sativa. Can't go wrong if you like a very light citrus taste along with a nice uplifting, get up and do something type of effect. One of my favs. Not really for bedtime”

“Let me start this off by saying this strain tastes so refreshing I can't even describe it but if I could I would say it taste like water, just so pure, the flower is extra pretty, definitely one of my favorite strains I've been dying to get it again, it just made me happy, good for group gathering gets the creative juices running.”
“Once again tolerance. Smelled good and I think it made me tired”
“Was pretty faded for the first hour, haven't had something hit me like that in a while. Really enjoyed this one”

“Was not a fan at all. Made me very anxious and uncomfterlbe. My head was spinning and I couldn't stop looking for cops or something. Made everybody at the party tweak out a bit. Smoke with extreme caution and never baseball a rip of this stuff!”
“I fuckin hate this shit. Not worth it.”
